comments.author: Trofo
comments.body: There is F1 pool, and you are missing my La Liga pool. Regarding La Liga pool all the data is exactly the same as for Serie A so uou can just copy it and change name. I would post links for you but I am on mobile so it is PITA to do it for stuff you don't have ready.I would also suggest you add sponsorship money in the table. For My pools it is 0.1BTC, PL is 0.2, Bundesliga and Fantasy are 0.05.There will also be Champions League pool but it is not live yet.

comments.body: Quote from: famososMuertos on July 22, 2022, 04:50:53 AMOthers:F1 pool.Champions League pool.Where is this Champions League pool? I don't see it anywhere.Well it's a pretty useful topic because not all people are looking at all those threads. The EPL one is easily noticeable because it has a dedicated thread for the new season and it has been placed in the Games and Rounds section but the other are in threads from the previous seasons in the gambling section, so if you don't look at these topics carefully and are not aware of those new pools you can miss them unfortunately.

comments.body: We are only a few hours away from the start of La Liga and Serie A, on the other hand, PL continues to receive registrations and has reached the payment up to position 20.In the same way for those who find out today, or are simply waiting to hear the famous anthem, the UEFA Champions League Football Predictor Pool has a deadline, 6 sep, 2022.So for now the numbers are as follows:Officially closed:/#Pl.PL: 61.Bundesliga Football Pool: 21PFPL: 16.¬†Still with availability:PL; The round 1 has already been played.La Liga; First game on Friday, August 12, 15:00Serie A ; It starts on Saturday, August 13.UCL: starting 6 Sep 2022.

comments.body: We have pool and other additional things for the soccer world cup.Sportsbet's Bitcointalk World Cup 2022*¬†Marketplace > Gambling > Games and roundsSummary of this event.Competition format:1.-Limited space: 32 players2.-You have to answer a quiz and earn points for each correct answer.3. You will be a "NATIONAL team", and you will be playing each betting round but based on points, for first phase the top two from each group advance to the second round. Then you play against another competitor (h2H), how? scoring points instead of goals. In short, if you know how the World Cup is played in each of its stages, it's the same, only we don't score goals but points.As always this is not an official thread! for event details:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419096.msg61222514#msg61222514There you formalize your registration.For questions about this interesting modality:‚öΩ‚öΩ‚öΩ Sportsbet's Bitcointalk World Cup 2022 - discussion ‚öΩ‚öΩ‚öΩhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419097.msg61226583#msg61226583The traditional Pool is also available:Sportsbet.io's World Cup Prediction Sign-up. 0.002 to join 0.2+ in prizes*https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419161.0World Cup Fantasy‚öΩ Sportsbet.io ‚öΩ World Cup Fantasy ‚öΩ 5k in rewards ‚öΩ Discussion threadhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5419635.0:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::|Sponsor|Pool|Entry(BTC) |GTD*|Top-Pay*|1st:üèÜ|Escrow|App|GM|:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::|Sportsbet|WCP|0.002|0.2BTC|to define|0.1BTC|Yes|SuperBrue|hila...|:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::|Sportsbet|BTTWC|0.0015|$3500|üëÄ|1500$*|Yes|SuperBru|Cro2|:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::|Sportsbet|WCF|Free|$5000|10|$1500|Yes|Rounds|Cro2|:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::So...image credits/gifs:Road to 2022@Roadto2022
